text: @Milbank @ElaineM11584892 If @POTUS/ #PresidentTrump truly believes the coronavirus is a hoax, he will travel to Wuhan or South Korea to demonstrate that to the world. (Dont think he'd be keen to visit Iran, although that would indeed be brave, and showcase the amazing courage of the man.)

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Iran's deputy health minister tests positive for coronavirus a day after playing down outbreak fears
entity.description: During a televised press conference in Tehran on Monday, Iraj Harirchi was seen coughing and sweating while he assured the public that the coronavirus "situation is almost stable in the country." The Iranian deputy health minister, who is in charge of containing the spread of the pathogen, confirmed he tested positive for the virus the following day and is now under quarantine. The Islamic republic is currently amid a major outbreak with 15 dead, the largest outside of China.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
